snippet: The 16-year-old teenager accused of stabbing 22 people at his high school in Murrysville, Pa., was dazed “like a deer in the headlights” hours later and does not fully grasp what he did, his lawyer said on Thursday.
abstract: Lawyer for Alex Hribal, 16-year-old teenager accused of stabbing 22 people at his high school in Murrysville, Pa, says he was dazed 'like a deer in the headlights' hours later and does not fully grasp what he did.
lead_paragraph: The 16-year-old teenager accused of stabbing 22 people at his high school in Murrysville, Pa., was dazed “like a deer in the headlights” hours later and does not fully grasp what he did, his lawyer said on Thursday.
